  • Exports

High level dynamic SDL3 library bindings for Nim.

Imports

dynlibsdl3/config, dynlibsdl3/libsdl3, dynlibsdl3/utils, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/audio, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/blendmode, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/events, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/hints, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/init, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/keycode, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/log, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/messagebox, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/mouse, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/pixels, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/rect, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/render, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/surface, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/timer, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/version, dynlibsdl3/sdl3inc/video

                              forbids: [].}

  

    
    
#define SDL_QuitRequested() \
    SDL_PumpEvents(), \
    (SDL_PeepEvents(NULL, 0, SDL_PEEKEVENT, SDL_EVENT_QUIT, \
                    SDL_EVENT_QUIT) > 0))
